Feature.Name: Major Property
Feature.Text: When you become attuned to the artifact, one of your ability scores is reduced by 2 at random. A greater restoration spell restores he ability to normal.

MagicProperty.Name: Major Detriment - Inhibiting
MagicProperty.Description: When you become attuned to the artifact, one of your ability scores is reduced by 2 at random. A greater restoration spell restores he ability to normal.
